name: 傅子恒
objective: This course provides the fundamental knowledge, the structure and the designing methods of interactive game programming using Unity3D and C#. Students will learn how to split a game system into modular components and realize the whole system step by step.

W2	9/18	Level Design – part I

W4	10/2	Transform & Overlap

W6	10/16	Gameplay Framework
W7	10/23	Animation System / Fungus
W8	10/30	Game Manager & FSM
W9	11/6	Mid-term Demo
W10	11/13	Physics
